name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.50
lastChange: Added AI image generation! Admins can now generate images for items from prompts within the Asset Manager and directly in the item editing dialog. A global image style can be set in the AI Studio for a consistent look.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
